Task: Predicting prostate volume, PSA, and PSA density
Description: This task involves one of three possible predictions, which will be specified at the beginning of each case: (1) predicting prostate volume in cubic centimeters, (2) predicting Prostate-Specific Antigen (PSA), or (3) predicting prostate volume from the radiology report. If a range is given for prostate volume, calculate and use the average. PSA density may be mentioned, and is related to PSA and prostate volume via the formula: prostate volume = PSA / PSA density. Use this relationship if necessary to calculate the missing value.

single_label_regression.description: The prostate volume in cubic centimeters or the PSA value or the PSA density value.
